entry.title: Russia Eyes Gains in Ukraine's East After Kherson Withdrawal
entry.content: Moscow’s forces have hit Ukrainian positions in the country’s east while retreating elsewhere, and analysts expect Russia to bolster efforts there with redeployed troops.

entry.title: As Ukraine Scores Gains, U.S. Looks to Peace Talks
entry.content: American arms are flowing, but officials in Washington question how much territory Ukraine or Russia can win with winter approaching.

entry.title: Dozens of Americans Are Barred From Leaving China, Adding to Tensions
entry.content: Californian Henry Cai, who got into a business dispute, has been targeted by exit bans for nearly five years.
